AsciiBrush - Interface in asciipanel
Instances of AsciiBrush implement a strategy for drawing lines into an AsciiRaster surface.
AsciiFont - Class in asciipanel
This class holds information about a loaded font, that is the glyph collection and the width and height in pixels of glyphs.

AsciiPainter - Class in asciipanel
An instance of AsciiPainter exposes methods to draw graphics into an AsciiRaster instance, called the surface.
AsciiPainter(AsciiRaster) - Constructor for class asciipanel.AsciiPainter

asciipanel - package asciipanel
 
AsciiPanel - Class in asciipanel
It implements a swing panel that displays an ascii art image.

AsciiPanelModel - Class in asciipanel
This class models the state of an AsciiPanel instance, that is provides a raster and a font and notifies changes to observers.
AsciiPanelModel() - Constructor for class asciipanel.AsciiPanelModel
Constructs an AsciiPanelModel with null raster and and default font (CP437_9x16)
AsciiPanelModel(AsciiFont) - Constructor for class asciipanel.AsciiPanelModel

AsciiPanelModel(AsciiRaster) - Constructor for class asciipanel.AsciiPanelModel

AsciiPanelModel(AsciiRaster, AsciiFont) - Constructor for class asciipanel.AsciiPanelModel

AsciiRaster - Class in asciipanel
